description:
The Vampire Diaries co-creator Julie Plec is speaking out about Nina Dobrev‘s decision to leave the long-running CW series after this season ends.《吸血鬼日记》执行制片人Julie Plec说起了CW美剧《吸血鬼日记》本季季终Nina Dobrev要离开的这件事。

“She was just looking forward to moving on with no hard feelings and no drama,” Julie said on the KCRW podcast last week. “This is taking the personal out of it completely, from a storytelling point of view it’s a great challenge. As writers in the room we’re finding it very rejuvenating. Just on a strictly creative exercise level.”“她希望的是一个不要太难过的离开方式，”Julie在KCRW中透露。“但是客观来说，这对整个故事线来说会是一个很好的挑战。编剧们发现，在纯粹的制作层面来说，这样会让剧情重新恢复活力。”

“Nina had said earlier this year that she wanted to be done and we spent a little bit of time trying to talk her out of it. [We'd say,] ‘Oh, look at all these great plans of how you can stay!’” she explained. “And she finally was like, ‘No, I signed up for six years. I’ve done my six years. I’m ready to move on and spread my wings.’”“Nina今年年初跟我们说了她想离开的想法，我们花了些时间想要劝她。我们说‘我们可以这样改剧情呀，你留下吧！’”她说。“不过她最终还是说，‘不，我签了6年，合同到期之后我就不演了。我已经准备好要离开，在新的阶段里展翅翱翔了。”
